DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional, post-marketing observational study was conducted to obtain safety data from the use of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), in clinical practice, in pregnant women and their children in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Special Investigation of Kaletra in Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: All pregnant women who have received Kaletra for the treatment of HIV infection were eligible for this study Contraindications according to the Package Insert: Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any ingredient of Kaletra Patients who are receiving pimozide, cisapride, ergotamine tartrate, dihydroergotamine mesylate, ergometrine maleate, methylergometrine maleate, midazolam, triazolam, vardenafil hydrochloride hydrate, boriconazol
